duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide preliminary layouts using hand sketches, Bluebeam software or REVIT CAD software.
Carry out engineering design and detailing in a timely manner using Bentley structural software or by hand calculations/sketches.
Engage in client communication to verify conditions or requirements, including on-site or office meetings.
Function on multidisciplinary teams as an effective leader or team member to meet project goals.
Review and approve scopes, budgets, and schedules for assignments. Prepare proposals to provide professional services.
Review complete project documents for conformity and quality assurance.
Update Project Notes, Tasks, and Timecards in QuickBase regularly and timely.
Travel to job sites in the area, with limited overnights as required.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5-years’ experience in the industrial, commercial, and manufacturing sectors
Working knowledge of design standards and codes
